data.tooltip: When taking fatal damage unit heals for <d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanFatalDR_Heal.amount" style="Bold"/> and becomes invulnerable for <d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanFatalDR_InvulnBuff.duration" style="Bold"/> seconds. Effect has a cooldown of <d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanFatalDR_CDBuff.duration"/> seconds.
